testsuite.name: com.bookstore.usermanagement.KafkaEventListenerTest

testcase.name: handleEvents should handle null message gracefully()
handleEvents should process valid inventory event successfully()
handleEvents should process valid order event successfully()
handleEvents should process event with missing payload()
handleEvents should handle malformed JSON gracefully()
handleEvents should process event with complex payload()
handleEvents should handle empty message gracefully()
